SELECT a.id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_desc roleDesc, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, IFNULL((SELECT b.role_name FROM sys_eve_role b WHERE a.role_parent_id = b.id), '主角色') parentName FROM sys_eve_role a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.role_name LIKE '%${roleName}%'
AND role_parent_id = #{parentId}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
